title: Council Decision of 14 April 1997 appointing a member and an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Nursing Training
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 14 April 1997 appointing a member and an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Nursing Training (97/C 127/01)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to Council Decision 77/454/EEC of 27 June 1977 setting up an Advisory Committee on Nursing Training (1), and in particular Articles 3 and 4 thereof,
Whereas, in its Decision of 25 July 1994 (2), the Council appointed Ms Paloma GÓMEZ DÍAZ a member and Ms Misericordia GARCÍA HERNÁNDEZ an alternate member for the period ending 24 July 1997;
Whereas the Spanish Government has nominated Mr Honorio Carlos BANDO CASADO as a member and Mr Enrique FERNÁNDEZ DEL PINO as an alternate member to replace Ms Paloma GÓMEZ DÍAZ and Ms Misericordia GARCÍA HERNÁNDEZ respectively,
main_body: Mr Honorio Carlos BANDO CASADO is hereby appointed a member and Mr Enrique FERNÁNDEZ DEL PINO an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Nursing Training in place of Ms Paloma GÓMEZ DÍAZ and Ms Misericordia GARCÍA HERNÁNDEZ respectively for the remainder of their terms of office, which end on 24 July 1997.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 14 April 1997.
For the Council
The President
J. VAN AARTSEN
(1) OJ No L 176, 15. 7. 1977, p. 11.
(2) OJ No C 221, 9. 8. 1994, p. 3.
